display.title: This isn't Cryotheum!
description: Some specific fluids are &&dCryogenic&&r, which are too cold for ordinary pipes.
Thus... you need to pick the right pipe for the job.
Not many pipes support cold fluids, so you'll want to give &&aStainless Steel&&r or &&aIridium&&r a try. Later on you can use &&aNaquadah&&r or most of the fusion materials when you get there.
&&cWARNING:&&r&&r Cryogenics in the wrong pipes will cause &&cvoiding&&r, &&cpipe freezing&&r, and high rates of &&cdeath&&r! Be careful.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o This is the first time GregTech has cryogenic mechanics, a GTCEu-original feature!
